original_title: SS - uno spettacolo sulla Sindrome di Stoccolma nei lager nazisti
overview: A research on the difficult psychological dynamics found in the so-called Stockholm Syndrome within the Nazi concentration camps, precisely within the sections of prostitution blocks that were not even mentioned in the sad album of the history of the Shoah.
title: SS - uno spettacolo sulla Sindrome di Stoccolma nei lager nazisti
